scripts.fix-schema.ts: replace-in-file '/(;\s*if \()value === null/mg' '$1value === null || value.kind === ValueKind.NULL' generated/schema.ts --isRegex
scripts.codegen:kovan: node render-templates.js kovan && graph codegen && yarn fix-schema.ts
scripts.publish:kovan: yarn build:kovan && graph deploy --product hosted-service eccentricexit/light-curate-kovan-ii
scripts.codegen:rinkeby: node render-templates.js rinkeby && graph codegen && yarn fix-schema.ts
scripts.publish:rinkeby: yarn build:rinkeby && graph deploy --product hosted-service kleros/curate-rinkeby
scripts.codegen:xdai: node render-templates.js xdai && graph codegen && yarn fix-schema.ts
scripts.publish:xdai: yarn build:xdai && graph deploy --product hosted-service eccentricexit/curate-xdai-ii
